contentList.content: A collection of tools used for treating wounds in the field. Not as robust as an Injury Kit, lacking salves, tinctures and other important remedies, but a reliable collection of implements that stand the test of time nonetheless.

Tend to a creatures wounds, healing them. The target must wait before they can be tended to again.
This kit enables you to treat Injuries, based on a Medicine Check. The kit is not consumed on an unsuccessful attempt, though it can only be used once per day on any individual creature.
The Triage Kit has been used on you today, your body must rest and recover before it can be used again.
